title: Feeling a bit down, GD.
body:
Been feeling a bit down for the past month or so, even if my life's been great. I feel unaccomplished is all.

If you haven't been seeing me post on GD, and if I've been a lot more deadpan than usual, this is why. Heh.

Onto other things, I've been considering getting back into Star. People are telling me it picks up in the same sense that Steven Universe does.
